remarks: Value of the Yoneda embedding at an object.  The partially evaluated Yoneda embedding is also the contravariant Hom functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2017.)
statement:
yon11.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` C ) $.
yon11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
yon11.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
yon11.p $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
yon11.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
yon11.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
yon11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` ( ( 1st ` Y ) ` X ) ) ` Z ) = ( Z H X ) ) $.
